Welcome!
I'm the creator of this wonderful piece of the Internet.

I'm a penetration tester working in the areas of Application and Network Security. I tend to dabble in web and binary exploitation and I sometimes do some reverse engineering when needed. I've worked professionally in the Security industry for over half a decade.

Go on..

Library

In the library section you will find resources that have been useful to me over the course of the years. Either for learning new skills or refining a skill you already posess. There's is a ton of good content on the Internet, but finding it all is hard. You will find hidden gems of forgotten knowledge in here. It's like wading through the Vatican library and Smithsonian at the same time.

Weblog

I sometimes pick up the virtual pen and write some words on my weblog. Mostly for documentation of stuff I do that might prove useful to others including my future self.
